name: Broken Stick
description: A makeshift fishing rod fashioned from a broken branch and some old string. More likely to catch disappointment than fish.

name: Crude Wooden Rod
description: A simple rod carved from river willow. The line is rough hemp rope and the hook is bent iron. It works, barely.

name: Peasant's Fishing Pole
description: A basic but functional fishing rod used by common folk. Made from seasoned oak with a proper fishing line and iron hook.

name: Angler's Rod
description: A well-crafted fishing rod with a flexible tip and smooth reel. Favored by professional fishermen and those who take their angling seriously.

name: Master Fisher's Rod
description: An expertly crafted rod made from rare swamp reed and reinforced with metal guides. The balance is perfect and the line flows smoothly.

name: Enchanted Angler
description: A magical fishing rod that glows softly in the presence of fish. The enchanted line never tangles and the hook seems to attract fish of its own accord.

name: Rod of the Deep
description: Carved from kraken bone and strung with mermaid hair. This rod can reach incredible depths and catch creatures that dwell in the deepest trenches.

name: Celestial Fishing Rod
description: Forged from starfall metal and blessed by sea spirits. The line can extend infinitely and the hook can catch creatures from other planes of existence.

name: Leviathan's Bane
description: A legendary rod capable of hooking the greatest sea monsters. The line is woven from dragon tendon and the hook is carved from a god's fang. Few dare to use it.

name: The World-Angler
description: The ultimate fishing rod, said to be able to fish in the void between worlds. It can catch concepts, dreams, and even souls. The most dangerous fishing implement ever created.
